secondHeader.faculty: Faculty of Systems and Computer Engineering

home.second-phrase: Study in the best way at our faculty

about.first-question: What does the career consist of? <i class="fa-solid fa-chevron-up" style="color: #ffffff;">
about.first-answer: Systems Engineering (Ing. Sistemas) is a branch of Engineering that combines technology and creativity to design and manage comprehensive technological solutions in the digital age. At UTP, in order to enhance your professional path, we combine Systems Engineering with Computer Science, giving rise to our Systems and Computer Engineering program.
